snippet: Before Elliot O. Rodger killed six people and took his own life in Isla Vista, Calif., his mental health and increasingly withdrawn behavior worried his parents and others.
abstract: Estranged parents of Elliot O Rodger release statement saying that he demonstrated long history of mental health problems before killing six people and taking his own life in Isla Vista, Calif; describe serious psychological issues that began before Rodger was eight years old, noting that he became increasingly withdrawn and prone to violent statements in period preceding the attack.

byline.original: By ADAM NAGOURNEY, MICHAEL CIEPLY, ALAN FEUER and IAN LOVETT
byline.contributor: Adam Nagourney, Michael Cieply and Ian Lovett reported from Los Angeles, and Alan Feuer from New York. Jennifer Medina contributed reporting from Los Angeles, and Benedict Carey from New York.

lead_paragraph: Before Elliot O. Rodger killed six people and took his own life in Isla Vista, Calif., his mental health and increasingly withdrawn behavior worried his parents and others.

headline.seo: Elliot O. Rodger’s Killings in California Followed Years of Withdrawal
headline.main: Before Brief, Deadly Spree, Trouble Since Age 8
headline.print_headline: Before Brief, Deadly Spree, Trouble Since Age 8
